title: Furnished Modern Private entrance House 1 bd/1ba flat avail 8/14
posting_body: Available August 14

Near downtown-
Fabulous LOCATION
HOUSE ENTIRE PRIVATE garden level 1 large Quality Queen bed bedroom / 1 private bath with a tub and nice size living room and Huge modern new kitchen
Full of natural light
Dedicated PARKING SPOT AND FREE GREAT WIFI
can do month to month through October or 3 months or LONGer term( prefer 9-10 mo)
VIBRANTLY URBAN busy street, not in suburbs
Really nice STR FURNISHED for Traveling Nurse or Traveling Medical Professional or Remote Work From Denver, Digital Nomads,Separating or divorce, a couple
Wood floors
Quartz countertops, stainless appliances
Queen bedroom
Washer and dryer included in secured lock off laundry room ( shared by 2 other tenants)
Only other shared area is the patio with grill and fire pit and picnic table
FLEXIBLE END DATE- can be modified
FREE included off street parking dedicated spot included
ALL UTILITIES  are INCLUDED with less than 90 day rental -
Otherwise flat $95 fee/month to include :
Gas, Water, Waste, Trash, Recycling, COMPOST AND GREAT WIFI
House has Evaporative Cooler for cooling
Light and bright!
$1595 for one person or $1695 for a couple( $850 ea)
Centrally located near restaurants, cafes, hospitals, City Park, Denver Zoo, Museum of Nature and Science
BEST Housemates upstairs but all separate entrances-
PRIVATE your own
Can email but best to text
***Please describe a bit about you and your needs and your preferred move in date or, I am sorry, but I will think it's a scam and not resond.

Business
Remote Denver office!
Caring for a loved one in the hospital
Separated?
Any questions?
Feel free to reach out

BEST Housemates upstairs in another apt and BEST landlord
